summary: "The Hobbit" is a beloved fantasy book by J.R.R. Tolkien, published in 1937. It tells the story of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who goes on an adventure with a wizard and thirteen dwarves to reclaim their home and treasure from a dragon. Along the way, Bilbo faces many challenges and grows into a wiser and braver person. The book is famous for its exciting battles and clever characters, and it has sold over 100 million copies. It has also been made into successful movies and other adaptations.
title: The Hobbit
